# NSSaveOptions

**Enumeration**

The [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSCloseCommand/saveOptions] method returns one of the following constants to indicate how to deal with saving any modified documents:

## Declaration

```swift
enum NSSaveOptions
```

## Constants

- **NSSaveOptions.yes**: Indicates a modified document should be saved on closing without asking the user.
- **NSSaveOptions.no**: Indicates a modified document should not be saved on closing.
- **NSSaveOptions.ask**: Indicates the user should be asked before saving any modified documents on closing. When no option is specified, this is the default.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
